overview:
Ronald Brien has over a decade of high-tech corporate strategy, products & digital marketing, enterprise sales and strategic alliances experience. Ron acquired break through insights, processes and execution skills at Fortune 50 enterprises (Dell, HP) and high-growth global start-ups Omniture (Acquired by Adobe -$1.8B) and RightNow Technologies (acquired by Oracle $1.5B,) both of which he helped achieve Initial Public Offerings (IPO) on the NASDAQ stock exchanges.

Execution Skills:

  1. Market Positioning & Messaging
  2. Multichannel Demand Gen Technologies
  3. Enterprise Sales and Negotiation 
  4. Partner Program Creation & Enablement
  5. Marketing Communications (PR/ AR/ IR) 
  6. Go-to-Market planning & execution 
  7. Emerging Channels: web, social, mobile, video
  8. Team mgmt: Local, International, and Virtual
  9. Alliances Origination and Negotiation 10.Corporate Planning/ Marketing Budgeting
